title: Textile, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 235cm (92 1/4in.) Weft:79.5cm (31 1/2in.)
B. Warp: 237.5cm (92 3/4in.). Weft: 79.5cm (31 1/2in)
Both selvedges present on both. 
Height of repeat: 47.5cm.
description: Framed portraits of two young women dressed in 1830s costume arranged in offset alignment. In purple on white.
